name: Saint Seiya: Soldiers' Soul

task.name: wineexec
task.description: Running setup of the game. Just proceed and keep all settings at their defaults

content:
custom-name: Saint Seiya - Soldiers Soul - CD
game:
  exe: drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    requires: setup.exe
- task:
    args: /desktop=SaintSeiya,1024x780 $DISC/setup.exe
    description: Running setup of the game. Just proceed and keep all settings at
      their defaults
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/windows/explorer.exe
    include_processes: explorer.exe
    name: wineexec
wine:
  Desktop: true
